breakfast.name: Omlette
breakfast.description: Egg and cheese omlette with your choice of toppings.

breakfast.name: Oatmeal
breakfast.description: Made with steel cut oats and fresh fruits.

breakfast.name: Breakfast sandwich
breakfast.description: Egg and cheese on english muffin with your choice of bacon, sausage, or no meat.

breakfast.name: Eggs Benedict
breakfast.description: Poached eggs and Canadian bacon served on english muffins topped with hollandaise.

breakfast.name: Breakfast bacon
breakfast.description: Three slices of maple and brown sugar bacon.

lunch.name: Reuben
lunch.description: Corned beef, sauerkraut, swiss cheese, and thousand island dressing served on rye bread.

lunch.name: Cup of Soup
lunch.description: Cup of today's soup. Ask your server for details.

lunch.name: Soup
lunch.description: Bowl of today's soup. Ask your server for details.

lunch.name: Wedge Salad
lunch.description: Wedge of iceberge lettuce topped with blue cheese dressing, bacon cumbles, diced tomato, and chives.

lunch.name: Caesar Salad
lunch.description: Romain lettuce and croutons dressed with lemon juice, olive oil, egg, Worcestershire sauce, anchovies, garlic, Dijon mustard, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.

lunch.name: Soup and salad
lunch.description: Cup of soup of your choice with a side salad of your choice.

dinner.name: Burger
dinner.description: Burger with your choice of cheese, tomato, lettuce, ketchup, mayo, and/or mustard.

dinner.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
dinner.description: Cheddar and muenstar cheese on a grilled cheese sandwich.

dinner.name: Vegan jackfruit sliders
dinner.description: Three jackfruit sliders with bbq sauce.
